title: League crashes while in game
body:
Hey there, I've been having a reoccurring problem recently. Randomly when in game, League will just crash and I have to reopen the game. Not sure what is causing it, but maybe it is because I keep switching from Discord and back to League.

Not sure if any of this is useful but here you go:
- Play on windowed
- macOS High Sierra version 10.13

Thanks in advance!

replies.body: It might be your Mac having difficulties switching back and forth between those programs, or it might be related to the Discord Overlay feature. Try turning the overlay option off in Discord, and if that doesn't help turn Discord off entirely and try that in a custom game.
Quick update, League just crashed while it was the only thing open, has happened twice now.
Since high Sierra (which a red said was supported), my client crashes EVERY game.  It's unplayable and crashes during fights.
Played around in custom without switching back and forth for 5 minutes, and it seems to be working out. Thanks!
